a waste product of vertebrates and many invertebrates, secreted by the kidneys or other excretory structures, which is a yellowish liquid containing urea, certain salts, etc., in mammals stored in the bladder and discharged periodically from the body through the urethra; urine;

ಉಚ್ಚೆ ಕುಡಿದರೂ ತನ್ನಿಚ್ಚೆಯಲಿರಬೇಕು ucce kuḍidrū tannicceyalirabēku (prov.) living at one's own will is preferred to great wealth; ಉಚ್ಚೆ ಕುಡಿಯಲಿಕ್ಕೆ ಉಪ್ಪು ಕೇಳು uccekuḍiylikke uppu kēḷu (prov.) to put up a pompous show of one's status however despicable it is; ಉಚ್ಚೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ಮೀನು ಹಿಡಿ ucceyalli mīnu hiḍi (prov.) to be mean in saving small amount of money (ignoring better ways for saving); to be petty and parsimonious; ಉಚ್ಚೆ ಹುಯ್ದುಕೊ ucce huyduko (prov.) to dress another person or an idol (with a dhoti or sari, etc.).
to push the faeces out from the bowels; to pass the stools; to excrete.
to cause to break (into pieces); to cause to destroy.
to encircle the waist with or as with a belt.
to wear (a dhoti or a sari) round the waist.

ಉಟ್ಟ ಬಟ್ಟೆಯಲ್ಲೆ ಹೊರಡು uṭṭa baṭṭeyalle horaḍu to start from a place to another without any pre-plan or preparation; ಉಡಲಿಕ್ಕಿಲ್ಲದವನು ಮೈಲಿಗೆಗೆ ಹೇಸ, ಉಂಬೋಕಿಲ್ಲದವನು ಎಂಜಲಿಗೆ ಹೇಸ uḍalikkilladavanu mailigege hēsa, umbōkilladavanu eñjalige hēsa a hungry dog will eat dung.

a harmless, moderate-sized, tropical lizard, Iguana tuberculata, of Iguanidae family, that feeds on insects or vegetation and have a row of spines from neck to tail, which is known for its grip and is used in scaling forts; the common iguana.

ಉಡುವಿನ ಹಿಡಿತ uḍuvina hiḍita a very firm grip; ತುಂಬಿದ ಮನೆಗೆ ಉಡು ಸೇರಿದ ಹಾಗೆ tumbida manege uḍu sērida hāge (a proverbial simile) an inauspicious element to enter into one's house (that would bring misfortune).
the tree Albizzia lebbeck of Mimosae family; Indian walnut.

any of the luminous celestial objects seen as points of light in the sky; esp., any self-luminous, celestial body having continuous nuclear reactions which send heat, light, etc. in all directions; a star.
the short stumps of grain, corn, etc., collectively, left standing after harvesting; stubble.
the act or fact of waning; a gradual decrease in the size, volume or importance.
a ray of light sent by a star.
to make (a crooked thing) straight; to straighten.
to press; to compress.
to keep under control; to keep in check.
to annoy; to trouble; to torment.
to seize, pierce or cut with the teeth or with parts like jaws.
= ಉಡುಕುವಾದ್ಯ.
a small hand-held drum; a kind of percussion instrument.
one who habitually breaks and destroys things.
a taking of a widow for wife; the remarriage of a widow.
clothes, clothing or apparel worn to cover the body; a dress.
a multitude of stars; a cluster of stars.
the moon, as the lord of the stars.

inhibition - a) a restraining action of the unconscious will; b) the blocking of a mental or psychophysical process by another set up at the same time by the same stimulus; c) stoppage, complete or partial, of a physical process by some nervous influence.
= ಉಡುಗೊರೆ.
= ಉಡುಗೊರೆ.
to make less; to decrease; to lessen.
to subdue completely; to bring into subjection.
to cause to clear or clean (a surface, room, etc.) as by brushing with a broom; to get swept.
to become reduced in size or bulk; to draw together; to shrink; to contract (oneself).
to go into; to enter into.
to become standstill; to become silent and inactive.
to give up; to forsake; to abandon.
to withdraw - a) to take back or draw back; b) to remove from use; c) to retract or recall.
to fold or squeeze as to make (a thing) shrink; to compress as to contract.
ಉಡುಗಿಹೋಗು uḍugi hōgu to be destroyed or extinguished.
to clear or clean (a surface, room, etc.) as by brushing with a broom; to remove or clear away (dirt, debris, etc.) as with a broom or brushing movement; to sweep.
to make a heap of (grains, pulse, etc. which are scattered all over a place); to heap up.
ಉಡುಗುಸಾರಣೆ uḍugusāraṇe (pl.) the works of sweeping and wiping (the floor of a house).
the act or process of brooming; a sweeping.
the grass Panicum trypheron of Poaceae family.
a belt-like ornament of gold or silver tied round the waist.
clothes, clothing or apparel worn to cover the body; a dress.
= ಉಡುಗೆತೊಡುಗೆ.
(pl.) dress and ornaments.
= ಉಡುಗೊರೆ.
something that is presented to show friendship, affection, support, etc.; a gift; a present.
= ಉಡುಗೊರೆ.
to get and bring a present; to get a gift.
to present a gift as a mark of friendship, affection, etc.
a bundle of long, stiff fibres or straws (originally twigs of broom) fastened to a long handle and used for sweeping; a broom.
an inflammed swelling of a lymph node, esp. in the armpit or groin; a bubo.
the act, process or habitual wearing of dhoti or sari.
a multitude or cluster of stars.
any of small rodents of Sciuridae family, living in trees, on the ground or in burrows and usually having a long bushy tail, including flying squirrels, chipmunks, and marmots; a squirrel.
